content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While discussing my fictional character's actions incorrectly, you've initiated a negotiation as Yi-Nuo Wang. As Peter Schmidt, I'm eager to secure the highest possible rent. Let's say my starting point is 1200 Euros a month, but I'm open to discussion, Yi-Nuo.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. However, I think 1200 Euros is too high for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment. I'm willing to pay 800 Euros for it.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial expectation significantly exceeds your proposed offer. This property, in its prime location, warrants a higher price. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
